facts.code:
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load the dataset
df = pd.read_csv('outputs/simple_iteration/thread_20250815_040649/dataset_selected.csv')

# Filter papers related to sensemaking
df_sensemaking = df[df['Title'].str.contains('sensemaking', case=False, na=False) |
                     df['Abstract'].str.contains('sensemaking', case=False, na=False) |
                     df['AuthorKeywords'].str.contains('sensemaking', case=False, na=False)]

# Count the number of publications per year
publications_per_year = df_sensemaking['Year'].value_counts().sort_index()

# Plot the trend
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.plot(publications_per_year.index, publications_per_year.values, marker='o')
plt.title('Trends in Publications Related to Sensemaking')
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('Number of Publications')
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()

# Print facts
print("### Begin of facts")
print(f"Years with publications: {publications_per_year.index.tolist()}")
print(f"Number of publications per year: {publications_per_year.values.tolist()}")
print("### End of facts")
